title: Happy birthday to me~
author: jsahnc
txt_content:
今天很高兴，因为今天是我的生日~
So happy birthday to me.
也很希望得到大家的祝福~~~

replies.author: Vanicth
replies.txt_content: Happy birthday to you！恭喜发财!!!

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content: 生日快乐，发点人气可好，金粒也行

replies.author: 酥坡曼
replies.txt_content: 祝你生日开心,出门捡到好东西.

replies.author: G王者Z巨蟹Y
replies.txt_content:
LZ生日快乐！吃蛋糕了没呀？

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content: 放心我不会祝福你的你信吗我知道你肯定不信但是事实似乎可能的确就是如此

replies.txt_content:

Happy birthday to you！恭喜发财!!!
{:10_520:}谢啦

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Chef.炸肉饼
replies.txt_content: 其实是要人气，这帖也太水了，不加几个字吗？
